text: Rhiza Ann Cenon Simbulan, popularly known as Ryza Cenon, is a Filipina actress, dancer, and model. ==Biography== Ryza Cenon was born on December 21, 1987 in Nueva Ecija, Philippines. In 2004, she auditioned in the talent show StarStruck Season 2 of GMA Network along with fellow stars Megan Young, Mike Tan, and LJ Reyes. She became the Ultimate Female Survivor of the StarStruck Season 2 in the same year. As an actress she appeared on several TV shows of GMA Network like Darna (2004), Majika (2006), Fantastic Man (2007), and Machete (2011). She became famous when she starred as the mistress Georgia Ferrer in the Philippine afternoon drama series Ika-6 na Utos (2016). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:Filipino actors Category:1987 births Category:Filipino television presenters Category:People from Nueva Ecija
title: Ryza Cenon
